channel.title: Old Camel's Home
channel.description: Recent content on Old Camel's Home

item.title: Non Lucrative Visa
item.description:
Hi there,

I am Cau, the fat one of the family.

item.title: About
item.description: I am an old camel. After years wandering in the deserts, it’s time for me to retire. Europe would be a nice change of scenery and weather. It would be greener and cooler. I think I have enough desert sand and scorching heat.

item.title: Pau
item.description: Pau is a cat, he is skinny.
